title: Citi Leaders Named to American Banker's 2016 "Most Powerful Women in Banking" List
summary: Today, American Banker magazine announced its 2016 "Most Powerful Women in Banking" lists. Once again, Citi made a strong showing. All of these talented leaders are not just vital to our businesses - they are also among the most respected bankers in our industry and play an integral role in our businesses and communities. Congratulations to all on this wonderful honor, we are fortunate and very proud to have them.
